channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
channel.desc: Plankton's pet amoeba Spot has puppies.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Odd Squad
channel.desc: A new villain named Mr Unpredictable challenges the Mobile Unit.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Odd Squad
channel.desc: The Odd Squad tube system has mysteriously been shut down.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Total Dramarama
channel.desc: Leshawna creates a paint-balloon fight to decide who she will take to an amusement park.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Miraculous: Tales of Ladybug & Cat Noir
channel.desc: Ladybug and Cat Noir face Myl?ne - aka Horrificator.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Pok?mon Horizons
channel.desc: During a match against Rika of the Elite Four, Liko realises what battling is all about.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Deadly Dinosaurs with Steve Backshall
channel.desc: Steve is on a mission to unearth the sneaky dinosaurs that were far deadlier than they first appeared! We're learning new things about even the most notorious dinosaurs, and first up, Steve meets Sinornithosaurus - a dinosaur hiding a deadly dental secret. He then races a velociraptor in a climbing challenge, with a surprising result. Finally, Steve puts Argentinasaurus to the ultimate test to see how earth-shattering its stamp really was.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: The Next Step
channel.desc: A reality-style drama following the lives of a group of dancers at the Next Step Dance Studio as they attempt to win the regional dance championships. Eldon struggles to choose between Emily and Michelle as his partner for his duet performance. Meanwhile, West and Stephanie are at odds on how to proceed with their duet, leaving West wanting to quit altogether.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Shark Bites
channel.desc: Steve Backshall meets a superspeedy shark. Reaching speeds of 50kph, the mako is the fastest shark in the sea. With fast-swimming prey like tuna and mackerel, mako sharks need to move quickly. But how do they reach such meteoric speeds? Steve first snorkels with these lightning-quick sharks off the coast of San Diego in California, before getting under their skin in his shark lab to reveal their hidden speed secrets.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: This is CBBC!
channel.desc: Tune every day from 7.00am.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Shaun the Sheep
channel.desc: Shaun escapes through a ?portal? inside Shirley?s wool to flee an annoying Bitzer, only to emerge into a chaotic version of the farm without him. Desperate to escape, he repeatedly jumps back inside Shirley, emerging somewhere worse each time.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Danger Mouse
channel.desc: The world is in jeopardy and the only thing that can save it is a 1,000ft Penfold.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Dennis & Gnasher Unleashed!
channel.desc: When Gnasher gnashes Walter's portrait, he gets revenge with a titanium sausage that leaves Gnasher toothless and miserable. Dennis and the gang decide to stage a heist to 'borrow' some diamonds until Gnasher's teeth grow back.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Boy Girl Dog Cat Mouse Cheese
channel.desc: Stevie Smith challenges Boy in the mini-golf tournament. However, as they practice, they actually become fast friends and neglect their training to hang out! When the contest arrives, it is revealed Stevie was only pretending to be Boy's friend to keep him from practicing! But maybe Boy has a trick of his own up his sleeve..

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Newsround
channel.desc: Topical news magazine for children.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
channel.desc: The Lemmings find a book on Robin Hood and get inspired to steal Grizzy.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
channel.desc: Transformed into a fairy, a lemming organises a magic show and gets rid of Grizzy.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
channel.desc: Patrick leads a stranger around Bikini Bottom.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Odd Squad
channel.desc: Now that Opal is off fighting oddness with her sister, the Mobile Unit holds a press conference to introduce a new member. With a group of villains causing oddness, it is not a good time for The Big O to share that she's heading off to space.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: The Strange Chores
channel.desc: The gang is thrust centre stage when Helsing swaps lives with Dracula for a reality show. Unafraid of the limelight, Dracula becomes the perfect TV father - but Que binge-watches his every move.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Danny and Mick
channel.desc: Danny and Mick's dad Clive has brought a dog into the leisure centre, even though there is a strict no-pets policy. It is up to Danny and Mick to make sure Sharon doesn't find the dog while Clive has some lunch in the cafe.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Gladiators: Epic Pranks
channel.desc: Nitro pranks Viper with a fake interview that ends with an unexpected splashdown, but he doesn?t find it funny! The other Gladiators have sneaky behind-the-scenes fun at Sheffield Arena.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
channel.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings fight over a crab that can open coconuts with a snip of its claw.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Miraculous: Tales of Ladybug & Cat Noir
channel.desc: Ladybug and Cat Noir meet heroes from a parallel world.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Loveykins
channel.desc: A tale from Quentin Blake's Box of Treasures. After a storm, Angela Bowling discovers a small helpless, abandoned bird which she lavishes with care and attention. She feeds Augustus (her little 'Loveykins') with the finest cakes and sweets. However, as he grows bigger and bigger, he longs for more bird-style treats such as worms and bugs.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Gladiators: Epic Pranks
channel.desc: Nitro pranks Diamond when the guest on a live TV show can?t stop pumping! The other Gladiators have fun behind the scenes, pranking the audience at Sheffield Arena.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: The Dumping Ground
channel.desc: Oscar meets his dad, who is a magician, for the first time. Posh schoolgirl Hana has her world turned upside down when her parents are sent to prison and she is sent to the DG.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: The Dumping Ground
channel.desc: Brodie discovers something huge about Chelsey?s past that threatens her relationship with her twin, Keira. Meanwhile, Frankie sets out to prove he is the true Chaos Master of the DG.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: High Hoops
channel.desc: With mum away with Jim, Clanger persuades Conor and Aoife to throw a party. Aoife's attempts to impress Jamie backfire when she is tricked by Jessica and pranked by Clanger.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Deadly 60
channel.desc: Steve heads to Ecuador to dive with the giant manta ray. He also gets a unique view of the biggest baby on Earth and rescues a turtle caught in a fishing line.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Andy and the Band
channel.desc: With Andy?s mum getting injured, Ruby needs a new doubles partner for a tennis tournament. Mac faces his fears to unearth a secret tennis talent and take to the court once again.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Bro's in Control
channel.desc: Brosmas is here! Callum's Christmas challenges await Adam and Joe in a festive showdown! Gingerbread houses, gift wrapping, tree decorating - Christmas needs a little competition.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Octonauts: Above & Beyond
channel.desc: A tsunami washes some sea creatures inland; the Octonauts trek into the forest to help.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Big Lizard
channel.desc: Cosima and Big Lizard investigate the cause of Dad's mysterious sleepwalking in an adventure that takes them around Proxima and right back home again.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Danger Mouse
channel.desc: Animated series. Danger Mouse has to face his only fear when Penfold accidentally awakens a gigantic World Wide Spider.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Dennis & Gnasher Unleashed!
channel.desc: Pieface is secretly doing underpants laundry chores for Walter, hoping to help Dennis save up some cash. He urges the gang to audition for a replacement Pieface to make up for his mysterious absence.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Super Happy Magic Forest
channel.desc: The heroes set out on a quest to find out who is draining colour from the forest and muster all their positivity to save it from greyness.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: The Next Step
channel.desc: It's the final day of the Brawl, and Team Micheldon's clash with the Masked Dancers is The Next Step's last hope to save the studio.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: The Dengineers
channel.desc: With her mum working 12-hour shifts, Sienna has to spend most of her time at her nana's house, but the space is a bit boring and not really a great place to hang out. Add in Sienna's love of spying, and it seems that what Sienna really needs is a new bedroom which can double up as a spy den, with lots of techy gadgets inside her 'top secret' lair.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: The Deep
channel.desc: Does Dolos really have a lead on finding Ant?s grandparents? Or is he leading the Nektons into a dangerous chasm between moving tectonic plates for nefarious purposes.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Dragons: The Nine Realms
channel.desc: Tom and Jun take a risk in revealing the secret of the Hidden Realm to D?Angelo in order to aid an injured dragon, and D?Angelo bonds with Plowhorn.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Dennis & Gnasher Unleashed!
channel.desc: Dennis is mistaken for a Beanotown baddie while in disguise to sneak into a 12A film. At first Dennis loves being treated like a celebrity, but as things begin to go awry, his friends have to save him by revealing his real identity and capturing the real diamond-stealing baddie.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Ninja Express
channel.desc: When a cavewoman orders fire, the Ninjas travel to Valhalla and face the Gods to win the use of Thor's hammer.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Super Happy Magic Forest
channel.desc: The blossom has gone missing. No, not Blossom the unicorn, the blossom on the trees! The heroes are sent on a quest deep into the heart of the forest, where legend has it you can see a face watching you from the trees. Twinkle doesn?t believe in legends, but when help comes from nowhere as they try and stop the scoundrel that is stealing the blossom, she is forced to reconsider.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Shaun the Sheep
channel.desc: Set on a remote rural farm, Shaun's flock lives a peaceful life under the watchful eye of their sheepdog Bitzer. The farmer is sick in bed, and with Bitzer playing nursemaid, it's down to Shaun to handle the daily chores around the farm - with disastrous results.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Boy Girl Dog Cat Mouse Cheese
channel.desc: Every year, Boy enters and wins the Pickle Prince competition. However, when Dog is convinced to enter the contest to give Boy some competition, a feud erupts between the two.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
channel.desc: Mr Krabs is too scared to get his physical.

channel.name: CBBC UK

channel.desc: The Mobile Unit reports to the New York City Odd Squad to help with a big problem.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Odd Squad
channel.desc: An agent-in-training visits the Mobile Unit.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Total Dramarama
channel.desc: Owen struggles with the idea that he is about to lose his BFF Noah to a gifted military school.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Miraculous: Tales of Ladybug & Cat Noir
channel.desc: Ladybug and Cat Noir face Dark Cupid, alias Kim.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Pok?mon Horizons
channel.desc: A visit to Naranja Academy results in answers, and new questions, about Terapagos.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Deadly Dinosaurs with Steve Backshall
channel.desc: If you thought that dinosaurs were the most dangerous things in the Jurassic, think again! There was actually something way worse and far more deadly! In this episode, Steve goes on a mission to uncover what was deadlier than the dinosaurs - from massive monsoons and supersized sandstorms to ballistic bacteria and gory gas. And in an epic finale, Steve ends with a bang as he recreates the dinosaur-killing asteroid impact in an experiment that's second to none.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: The Next Step
channel.desc: The A-Troupe is selected to perform in a music video for the band Brighter Brightest. However, the dancers become divided over the routine that Emily has choreographed.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Shark Bites
channel.desc: Steve Backshall meets the most ferocious shark of all. The great white shark is one of the greatest hunters on the planet, and Steve looks at what it is that makes them such perfect predators. He dives with them in the open ocean, revealing clever camouflage, and heads into his shark lab to take a closer look at their terrific teeth.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: This is CBBC!
channel.desc: Tune every day from 7.00am.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Shaun the Sheep
channel.desc: Children's animation set on a remote rural farm. Shaun's flock lives a peaceful life under the watchful eye of their sheepdog Bitzer, but Shaun's insatiable curiosity often leads him into the unlikeliest adventures. A cabbage from a passing truck bounces into the field, and Shaun decides to use it as a football, but the pigs are out to spoil the sheep's game.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Danger Mouse
channel.desc: When secret information is leaked from HQ, all eyes fall on Colonel K. Is it possible he is a traitor, or is there something suspicious about his moustache.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Dennis & Gnasher Unleashed!
channel.desc: It's the famous Beanotown Freewheeler Derby! During practice, the gang realize Walter's go-kart is especially speedy. Worried that Walter will beat his record, Dennis creates a lighter, faster kart but loses control and injures himself. It is up to Rubi's wheelchair know-how and Dennis' super-speedy karting skills to win the race.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Boy Girl Dog Cat Mouse Cheese
channel.desc: Sick of being overlooked by the family because of his small size, Mouse builds an invention to make him grow. However, the bigger he gets, the more unintentionally destructive he becomes, and now the family needs to shrink him back to normal before he accidentally destroys them all.

channel.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings are fighting over a crown.

channel.name: CBBC UK

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: The Strange Chores
channel.desc: When Charlie ignores the rules of Pierce's magical board game, the living pieces escape, creating a dicey situation that the gang must roll with.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Danny and Mick
channel.desc: The leisure centre's basketball team are off to play a match at Laugh World's World of Laughing. However, after failing to make the team, Danny has the bright idea of becoming the team mascot so that he can go on the trip. If only he can find a costume in time.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Gladiators: Epic Pranks
channel.desc: Nitro pranks Hammer with a hysterical, historical Gladiator mix-up in a magazine interview, and the other Gladiators have sneaky backstage fun at Sheffield Arena.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
channel.desc: A helicopter takes off from the beach, leaving behind installations for a TV game.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Pok?mon: Diamond and Pearl
channel.desc: As Ash and his friends journey to Crown City, mysterious forces are in motion that could bring untold misfortune to them all! What secrets does Ash?s new Pok?mon friend, Zorua, have to hide? Why is the powerful Zoroark rampaging through the city, and what does the appearance of the legendary Pok?mon Raikou, Entei, and Suicune mean.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: The Dumping Ground
channel.desc: Maisie is determined to win a place at a fashion school, but it won?t be easy. At the DG, Shanice has a bad hair day, and Vinny is struggling with his homework.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: The Dumping Ground
channel.desc: The gang are on holiday, and Hana meets an old school friend. Can she admit to living in the DG? Harmony wants to go ghost hunting but ends up catching something else.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: High Hoops
channel.desc: It?s the season finale, and the Vipers could get promoted! However, Aoife is headhunted for county trials - can she do both and make it to the big final against arch-rivals the Comets.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Deadly 60
channel.desc: Steve gets strangled by a python on a night-time river expedition, climbs a 40-metre tree and finds out why our thirst for palm oil is threatening bears and orangutans.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Andy and the Band
channel.desc: Attempting to become young again, Whiff accidentally turns the Odd Socks into babies! With Whiff as their babysitter, how will the baby-faced band do an interview and play a gig.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Bro's in Control
channel.desc: Callum is a Little Bro in control! He?s pitting his Big Bro Adam against best mate Joe to see who will win a series of funny, gungy and gross challenges and who will take on a forfeit from the Wheel Of Doom in this epic competition. Callum may be Little Bro, but he?s in control, so Adam and Joe need to impress him! Adam and Joe wake up to discover Callum has made their arms grow extra long overnight. How will they walk the dog, make brekky and ? most importantly ? style their trademark locks with really long limbs? Once Callum decides who?s taking the win, it?s onto the Biggest Splash Challenge. Who can plunge into gunge and create a splash that will impress Little Bro Callum so much he excuses them from the Wheel of Doom?s rank forfeit.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Octonauts: Above & Beyond
channel.desc: When a flamingo chick gets left behind, it?s up to the Octonauts to save the young bird.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Big Lizard
channel.desc: Big Lizard accidentally deletes some of Dad's 'boring' Proximan audio recordings. Through a dramatic sound adventure, Cosima realises the recordings are not boring - they're cosmic.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Danger Mouse
channel.desc: Animated series. Only Danger Mouse can save the world from chaos when the Baron stops the world spinning with a plague of traffic lights.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Dennis & Gnasher Unleashed!
channel.desc: It?s time for Gnasher?s annual bath, but the stinky hound will do anything to avoid the tub. Dennis and Gnasher go head to head in a town-wide game of cat and mouse ? or rather, tripe hound and wheelie bathtub.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Super Happy Magic Forest
channel.desc: The heroes are lured away by a cloaked figure to compete for the title of Quester of the Year, leaving the forest with no-one to protect its scones.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: The Next Step
channel.desc: With the Brawl concluded, The Next Step use their recent fame to fundraise, while Lucien plots to destroy the studio once and for all - but not if A-Troupe has anything to say about it.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Horrible Histories
channel.desc: Historical sketch show based on the successful books. A Victorian teacher is confused by her pupils' bizarre names, the Romans run out of animals to execute and Queen Victoria advertises her exercise DVD.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: The Deep
channel.desc: A mysterious dolphin in a sophisticated electronic harness zaps all the Rover's power! Ant and Fontaine manage to remove the harness, but can they rehabilitate this cybernetic dolphin to survive in the wild.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Dragons: The Nine Realms
channel.desc: Tom and the others debate how to keep the dragons a secret, even as a rambunctious young cloaking dragon gets loose in town and pursues a friendship with a reluctant Alex.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Dennis & Gnasher Unleashed!
channel.desc: When Dennis finds Professor Screwtop's time machine in the lab, he can't resist using it without reading the instructions and starts a chain of events that lead to Gnashersaurus rex rampaging through Beanotown! How is Dennis going to set things right without bumping into other versions of himself and destroying the space-time continuum.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Ninja Express
channel.desc: The Ninjas help a misunderstood horse find what he is looking for in a supermarket, while Konpeki competes in a TV singing competition.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Super Happy Magic Forest
channel.desc: The heroes are relieved that the loud, threatening voice they can hear actually belongs to a small slug named Zorgoth, who is armed with a megaphone. However, when Zorgoth uses his Orb of Compression to shrink the heroes down to the size of ants, their relief evaporates. They must now embark on a long and dangerous quest, through their picnic items and beyond, to warn the Council before Zorgoth shrinks the entire forest.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
channel.desc: The Lemmings are determined to train Grizzy, who would rather lounge around.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Boy Girl Dog Cat Mouse Cheese
channel.desc: After causing a ruckus at the Town Fair, Dog asks his old sensei to train him to be calmer. Unfortunately, Dog's new peaceful attitude might be even worse.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
channel.desc: Plankton poses as a wish-granting genie.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Odd Squad
channel.desc: When members of the Mobile Unit get turned into sandwiches, The Big O comes to the rescue.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
channel.desc: While falling, Grizzy performs a series of acrobatics that amazes the Lemmings.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Blue Peter
channel.desc: Joel, Abby, Shini and Henry reveal a brand new look for the Blue Peter studio, including new presenter Hacker T Dog! Gladiator Steel joins us for a world record challenge, and Joel races a supercar.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Total Dramarama
channel.desc: Owen and Beth decide they must defend the ants that Courtney and Leshawna want to harm.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Pok?mon Horizons
channel.desc: Dot shines when dysfunction is on the menu for Kingambit and a struggling cafe.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Deadly Dinosaurs with Steve Backshall
channel.desc: In this special episode, Steve Backshall looks back at the most awesome experiments over the series and chooses his highlights. He then uses them to build the ultimate deadly dino and create a crazy hybrid! From ginormous herbivores to fierce scavengers and hunters, which traits would you pick? The ferocious jaws of the T rex, the brutal weapons of the Stegosaurus, or the imposing size of the Diplodocus.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: The Next Step
channel.desc: In an effort to spend more time with Riley, James accompanies her to pick up costumes for the troupe. At the studio, Stephanie takes part in a photoshoot.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Shark Bites
channel.desc: Steve Backshall meets the most colossal shark in our seas. Measuring up to a record 18 metres, the whale shark is not only the largest shark, but the largest fish in the world. Steve dives with this gargantuan shark off the coast of Mozambique in Africa and reveals their somewhat surprising diet, before heading into his shark lab to get under their skin and reveal how they manage to filter their food from the water.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: This is CBBC!
channel.desc: Tune every day from 7.00am.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Shaun the Sheep
channel.desc: Children's animation set on a remote rural farm. The flock think they are in for fun when a kite blows into their field.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Danger Mouse
channel.desc: When the Baron speeds up the rotation of Earth using windmills, Danger Mouse and Penfold age 300 years and must take on their nemesis as very, very, very old men.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Dennis & Gnasher Unleashed!
channel.desc: Pieface's all-time hero, Cherry Bakewell, is coming to Beanotown to judge the annual bake-off. Pieface wants to make the best pie ever and win the competition, but when Dennis discovers Pieface has never actually baked a pie before, he does everything he can to ensure a win, with pie-splattering results.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Boy Girl Dog Cat Mouse Cheese
channel.desc: Girl and Cheese choose Cat to DJ the family's upcoming party. However, Boy, Dog and Mouse think Cat will become the focus of the party that's supposed to be for all of them.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Newsround
channel.desc: Topical news magazine for children.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: The Strange Chores
channel.desc: It's major treble when a flushed singing monster gets stuck in the toilet. Charlie starts to fret and tries to keep it low-key before it can harm anyone.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Odd Squad
channel.desc: Olympia and Otis are tasked with calling a truce between feuding guests. Curriculum: Using a Venn Diagram, 3D shapes: spheres and cubes.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Super Happy Magic Forest
channel.desc: Whilst on a quest to return the Icicle of Destiny, Trevor topples into a cavern of tiny mushrooms who treat him like a king.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: OOglies
channel.desc: The OOglies slip, slide and splat all over the place. This fast-paced madcap, stop-motion animation uncovers the mischief everyday household objects get up to when no-one is looking. The potato racers are driving each other round the bend, the DIY doughnuts attempt to fix the bathroom, the cavemen mushrooms come face to face with some big, hairy mammoth pots, fearless Pete Parsnip takes on a ferocious foe, and Slippery Nana takes on a pizza-cutting unicycle in the talent show.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Miraculous: Tales of Ladybug & Cat Noir
channel.desc: Ladybug and Cat Noir face their friend Max, now the Gamer.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Saturday Mash-Up! Live
channel.desc: The cast of The Next Step join Joe and Shereen for an epic morning of Mash-Up dance fun! But which one of them will be slimed? There?s cartoon fun with SpongeBob SquarePants, Stanley takes on a challenge inside a school and there?s another trip to Awful Coffee. Also, games, sketches, music and slime! Saturday Mash-Up is totally live? so anything can happen.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Blue Peter
channel.desc: Joel, Abby, Shini and Henry reveal a brand new look for the Blue Peter studio, including new presenter Hacker T Dog! Gladiator Steel joins us for a world record challenge, and Joel races a supercar.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Go Get Arty
channel.desc: The Kwapongs get noisy with homemade instruments, Aowen Jin paints UV art that glows, and Emily Steel - aka Gladiator Dynamite - flexes her muscles by drawing a weightlifting alpaca.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Game on Grandparents
channel.desc: Game on Grandparents, presented by eSports host, Julia Hardy is a gaming competition series like no other. With lots of laughs along the way, young gamers and their grandparents step in to each other?s lives like never before. Girls and boys who dream of playing at an eSports tournament are about to get the chance BUT there's a twist: they won't be playing themselves, they have to train their Gran or Grandad! And while their grandparents are busy practising, the children have to take on their roles about the house from washing up to walking the dog, to entertaining Grandma?s friends for the afternoon ? what could possibly go wrong?! In this episode its snow days all round as Kai and gran Karen take on Oscar and Granddad John in a Wii ski contest to challenge them like they?ve never been before. But how will they get on at a real snow slope when the grandparents (dressed in lycra, of course!) go head-to-head in a sledging race? And which team will be the fastest in the arena to go through to the grand final.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Odd Squad
channel.desc: The Odd Squad investigate strange events. Ms O tells the story of how she defeated a villain called the Patternista back when she was an agent.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Odd Squad
channel.desc: The Odd Squad investigate strange events. When characters escape their books in the library, Olive and Otto must find out how and why it's happening and put a stop to it.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: So Awkward Academy
channel.desc: Martha?s mum is back and as unimpressed as ever! Miss Marmaduke foolishly entrusts the others to help prove that Cranmede is an exceptional school.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Pickle Storm
channel.desc: Pickle wants to become school ambassador. When she accidentally clones herself, she thinks the second Pickle will help her win the day. Unfortunately, they soon fall out.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Operation Ouch!
channel.desc: Gladiator Dynamite is back to make sure things don?t get too explosive when Dr Dan and Dr Raph get into a Body Battle in a planktastic challenge to test their core muscles. On the basketball court, we meet Joel Henry, our Brilliant Bodies slam-dunk champion, to find out how he jumps so much higher than Dr Chris. It?s game on in the lab when Dr Xand becomes Saliva Man and Dr Chris tries everything he knows to overcome his superpowers as the doctors show us what spit is for. In an amazing Bodytricks, six kids surprise themselves by lifting Dr Ronx off a chair using only two fingers! And in the emergency department in Edinburgh, we follow the treatment of Niamh, who has broken her elbow doing a back handspring at gymnastics, and Adhya, who took a whack on the thumb during a hockey match. Ouch.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Horrible Science
channel.desc: A totally wicked song about gravity, a T-rex going to see a doctor, vampires on holiday, and Sir Isaac Newton riding a rollercoaster - welcome to the bizarre world of Horrible Science.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Gangnam Project
channel.desc: Unimpressed with the lyrics for Astra?s debut song, Hannah decides to write something more meaningful.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Jamie Johnson
channel.desc: It's Dillon's first try-out at Hawkstone Academy and Jack is sent along to cover it for the school blog. Jack can't stand seeing Dillon taking Jamie's place and sets out to try to persuade the Hawkstone manager to give Jamie a try. Dillon does well but is bullied by Hawkstone's star player, Jethro. Meanwhile, Jamie struggles to come to terms with the consequences of his actions and it's only when Mike gives him his beloved Book of Legends that Jamie finds the final piece of advice he needs - from football legend Ian Wright.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Danger Mouse
channel.desc: The last thing DM would normally want to do is play a boring board game, but when one arrives in the post, it releases knockout gas and he's surprised to wake up in the town of Greenback. Jeopardy Mouse, Hazard Mouse and Danger Cash have also been snatched and are equally clueless why until a dragon attacks the group and a net drops from the sky at an opportune moment. Our guys realise they have been shrunk to chess-piece size by Ian the Danger Fan and are now pawns in his real-life board game.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Danger Mouse
channel.desc: Danger Mouse's addiction to challenges threatens the world. Quark tricks Danger Mouse into transporting a ticking time bomb back to Earth. This device threatens to turn the entire world into gold within hours. Quark's face print is the key to deactivating the bomb, and while dragging the extra-mouthed extraterrestrial across space wouldn't usually pose much of a problem to DM, Quark aims to see his plan through by exploiting his captor's recently diagnosed 'Compulsive Challenge Disorder'. With the HQ in sight and minutes to spare, DM's 'CCD' takes hold at the worst possible moment, and he abandons the mission in order to battle an army of bounty hunters. Can DM come to his senses and channel his affliction into saving his friends and stop the planet from turning into a huge gold bauble.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Danger Mouse
channel.desc: Animated series. When Penfold scores a date with superstar Scarlett Johamster, Danger Mouse and the Professor provide conflicting advice.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Boy Girl Dog Cat Mouse Cheese
channel.desc: The kids audition for a movie that's shooting in town, and a reluctant Cat lands the role as lead alien. However, Cat would rather just go to the circus.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Boy Girl Dog Cat Mouse Cheese
channel.desc: When Dog is housebound with an injured paw, Mouse links a teddy bear to Dog's mind so that through the teddy, Dog can at least experience the great outdoors virtually.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Boy Girl Dog Cat Mouse Cheese
channel.desc: The gang is ready to celebrate Narwhal Day, one of their favourite holidays. However, they discover that it isn't a real holiday, just something Dad made up.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
channel.desc: Grizzy creates a new Yummy-based recipe: Choco-noodles.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
channel.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings discover a temple dedicated to an ancestral brioche.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Super Happy Magic Forest
channel.desc: When a witch struggles to master her new wand, Twinkle decides to have a go, only to make her friends vanish. She must now go on a solo quest to find them.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Super Happy Magic Forest
channel.desc: The heroes find treasure as they bid to save Merhaven from an angry seaweed. Blossom is delighted with her bath bomb treasure, but rather than use it, she insists on bringing it along on the watery quest to save it for a special occasion. But as the angry seaweed nears Merhaven, Blossom realises she must finally sacrifice her treasure to save the day.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Super Happy Magic Forest
channel.desc: The heroes go on a quest to get Hoofius?s Toby Jug back from the depths of the Riddling Ruins and are faced with a series of puzzles and traps to solve.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Mansour: Age of AI
channel.desc: Mansour traps Blink, but chaos erupts on Mars when alien patterns appear on the planet.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Mansour: Age of AI
channel.desc: Tarek runs for class president, and Blink backs him to spoil Mansour?s chances of winning.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Total Drama
channel.desc: They're back! All 16 campers from the first series return for more spills, thrills and drama! And a very special guest arrives on the island to really mess things up. Hope everyone packed an extra pair of pants.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Gremlins: Secrets of the Mogwai
channel.desc: Sam and Elle must look inward to find the strength.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: This is CBBC!
channel.desc: Tune every day from 7.00am.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Shaun the Sheep
channel.desc: Intrigued by a horror film on television, Timmy wanders into the farmhouse late one night. Shaun's rescue mission convinces the Farmer that the place is haunted.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Danger Mouse
channel.desc: When Penfold saves a celebrity from certain doom he becomes a media sensation. DM smells a rat... or at least some evil villainous hamster from another dimension.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Dennis & Gnasher Unleashed!
channel.desc: Dennis accidentally clones himself and uses his exact opposite clone to do all his chores and abide by the rules at school. All is going to plan until Walter realises what has happened and unleashes a clone cat army on the den.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Boy Girl Dog Cat Mouse Cheese
channel.desc: When Dog's rivalry with the mail woman comes to a head, she goes on leave - which means none of the siblings will get the important package they ordered.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Newsround
channel.desc: Topical news magazine for children.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: The Strange Chores
channel.desc: Charlie wrestles with being just a chore boy when Que hosts a monster hunter tournament. Entering in disguise, he is ready to lay the smackdown after a pretentious pre-teen participant mocks Pierce.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Odd Squad
channel.desc: Ms O leaves headquarters in the hands of an unlikely crew. Curriculum: Spatial Sense: Mapping, Position, Location and Direction.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Super Happy Magic Forest
channel.desc: Herbert takes his failed cooling hat invention along on a quest, using it to save the day after being faced with the Riddlemaster?s jibes.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Miraculous: Tales of Ladybug & Cat Noir
channel.desc: Ladybug and Cat Noir face Reflekta - aka Juleka.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
channel.desc: A helicopter takes off from the beach, leaving behind installations for a TV game.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Blue Peter
channel.desc: Joel, Abby, Shini and Henry reveal a brand new look for the Blue Peter studio, including new presenter Hacker T Dog! Gladiator Steel joins us for a world record challenge, and Joel races a supercar.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Game on Grandparents
channel.desc: Guided by pro gamer Slogo, the teams serve up an epic game of Switch Sports Volleyball. Who will score more points and earn a place in the final.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Go Get Arty
channel.desc: The Kwapongs bowl into space with DIY alien skittles, Emma Stothard weaves a wicker dog, and Kiell Smith-Bynoe draws a ghost so spooked, it?s nearly see-through.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: 4 O'Clock Club
channel.desc: When Clinton forgets Emily?s birthday, he finds a perfect last-minute gift in school lost property! Meanwhile, Polly and her mum go on a trip, so Evan plans a party at their house.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Danny and Mick
channel.desc: Joy orders Danny and Mick to clean all the windows outside the leisure centre. At first it is a fun job, but soon they realise that they need to bring in some bigger machinery to reach the higher windows. But do they know how to use it, and what could possibly go wrong.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Danny and Mick
channel.desc: Through an accident at the leisure centre, Danny and Mick discover what they think is a treasure map. The hunt is on to follow the golden route, but they end up digging their way into trouble.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Bro's in Control
channel.desc: Online potato sensation Spudman is joined by Joe-bot as he tries to program this malfunctioning robot to serve baked potatoes, and Adam B-bot gets to work in an ice cream shop.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: One Zoo Three
channel.desc: The OZT brothers meet the wildlife heroes working to save Britain's woodland animals. Cam rescues red squirrels, Tyler meets bears and wolves, and Aaron reveals the wonders of the tawny owl.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Deadly 60
channel.desc: Steve Backshall and his long-suffering crew return for a series of deadly encounters with animals hoping to earn a place on his hallowed Deadly 60 list. Steve and the team are in the jungles of Costa Rica. On his search for the Deadly 60, Steve gets strangled by a giant boa, is struck dumb by the strike speed of a viper, and plays hide-and-seek with a deadly bushmaster. As if that wasn't enough, he gets hands-on with a poisonous frog - and nearly gets a nip from a blood-sucking vampire.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Operation Ouch!
channel.desc: The doctors demonstrate the power of the pelvis by going head-to-head in a man v monkey contest! And there is ice cream for Mr Grumbles when the Time Machine zooms back to the 1950s.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Horrible Histories
channel.desc: HHTV's war reporter Mike Peabody regrets his decision to cover the Norman Siege of Palermo, the Pilgrim Fathers rap about Jamestown in America, and a German submarine captain has the worst toilet accident in history.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Horrible Science
channel.desc: Mary Ploppins soothes those digestive ills, Dr Big Brain tries banana power, and Einstein reacts to Tim Peake. Fred Sirieix guest stars.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Gladiators: Epic Pranks
channel.desc: Nitro pranks Apollo with fake influencer Aubry Devonne Keep, causing a big splash! The other Gladiators have fun behind the scenes and pranking the audience at Sheffield Arena.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Danger Mouse
channel.desc: Danger Mouse and Penfold receive a crash course in the customs of America's oldest holiday when they cover for Jeopardy Mouse as she takes time off for Thanksgiving. After barely escaping from the war zone of a Black Friday sale, they find themselves back at Jeopardy's apartment. DM prepares to tuck into the plentiful Thanksgiving spread when Hissteria and Ham Hands rise out of the dishes. They announce their newly formed coalition and joint plans to vanquish America. DM sticks to his stand-in duties and refuses Jeopardy's help as he and Penfold follow Hissteria and Ham Hands' trail. They find the villainous pair hijacking the Thanksgiving Day parade - launching a gas attack from the air that will turn everything in sight to stuffing. With holiday-saving solutions at a premium, Penfold convinces a reluctant DM to call Jeopardy for help. Jeopardy assures DM that doing things with friends is what Thanksgiving is all about as they set about taking Ham Hands and Hissteria down. They distract them long enough to cut them loose along with the rest of the gas-filled balloons.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Danger Mouse
channel.desc: Animated series. Professor Squawkencluck's seriousizer is nabbed by Pompom, the fun-and laughter-hating president of the clown planet of Bozoria.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Danger Mouse
channel.desc: Animated series. The 'ping' of a microwave causes Danger Mouse to blast a hole in the wall of Squawkencluck's laboratory.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Dennis & Gnasher Unleashed!
channel.desc: Mrs Creecher confiscates Dennis's rare sour sweetie, the Tongue Destroyer! Dennis is desperate to get the sweet back and takes his friends on an adventure to the school's Confiscatorium, a secret place where all confiscated goods are hidden, in the depths of Bash Street School.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Dennis & Gnasher Unleashed!
channel.desc: Dennis must escape detention and Bash Street School to make the Beanotown Brawny Bean Race before Walter wins it! With the help of a note placed in his desk, he must sneak past Mrs Creecher and make a run for it - unless the mysterious note-giver stops him first.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Dennis & Gnasher Unleashed!
channel.desc: Dennis's ultimate hero, Grizzly Griller, plans on trekking to the source of the River Beano, broadcasting the treacherous path on live TV. Dennis introduces him to his pet hamster Galahad - only to discover they are his biggest fear! Grizzly is so afraid that Dennis must disguise himself as his hero and go in his place.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Super Happy Magic Forest
channel.desc: The tired heroes must quest to find out and stop whatever is making the loud wailing noise that has kept the residents of the forest up all night.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Super Happy Magic Forest
channel.desc: When the heroes are faced with the Goblin King moving into the Big Birch, they decide to invent a quest that will soon have him running back home.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Super Happy Magic Forest
channel.desc: While questing to keep her hero safe on her long journey, superfan Blossom fusses and frets too much, making things awkward.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
channel.desc: Lacking electricity, Grizzy and the Lemmings fight over a tiara that controls fireflies.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
channel.desc: Grizzy finds a crystal skull which gives him the power to sow discord within a group.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
channel.desc: While falling, Grizzy performs a series of acrobatics that amazes the Lemmings.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
channel.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings end up lost after misplacing their jar of Yummy in a labyrinth.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: OOglies
channel.desc: The OOglies slip, slide and splat all over the place. This fast-paced, madcap stop-motion animation uncovers the mischief everyday household objects get up to when no-one is looking. Star bar finds a new rocket to fly to the moon, the ninja sushi are attacking, and fearless Pete Parsnip comes face to face with some savage staplers. The cavemen mushrooms hide from the rampaging plant pots, the baby blocks have a little accident and a heavy metal watermelon wows the judges at the talent show.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Dragons: The Nine Realms
channel.desc: Tom tries to prove Sledkin caused an explosion that injured a dragon in the Hidden World.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: The Dumping Ground
channel.desc: It?s a busy day at the Dumping Ground, with youth rep elections and a new care worker starting. However, sisters Harmony and Phoenix are about to shake things up at Porter?s Lodge.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: A Kind of Spark
channel.desc: Addie?s memorial has made her a local hero, but the attention of a mean-spirited troll signals the start of a new mystery. Who is LostGirl22? And what is her problem with Juniper.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: The Next Step
channel.desc: A reality-style drama following the lives of a group of dancers at the Next Step Dance Studio as they attempt to win the regional dance championships. The Next Step Dance Studio holds auditions for the ten dancers in A-Troupe that could take the studio to regionals later in the year. With the arrival of an amazing new dancer, no performer's spot is guaranteed.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: The Next Step
channel.desc: A reality-style drama following the lives of a group of dancers at the Next Step Dance Studio as they attempt to win the regional dance championships. The members of A-Troupe are chosen and one of the best dancers doesn't make the cut. Emily's position as dance captain is threatened when another dancer is also invited to audition for the position.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Gremlins: Secrets of the Mogwai
channel.desc: The heroes' faith in each other is put to a final test.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
channel.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings fight for the last jar of Yummy with magic Mayan bracelets.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: This is CBBC!
channel.desc: Tune every day from 7.00am.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Shaun the Sheep
channel.desc: Children's animation featuring the curious young sheep. The flock does not want to wash in freezing sheep dip, so Shaun hijacks the hot water from the farmer's bathtub.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Danger Mouse
channel.desc: Shortly after Danger Mouse's biggest fan comes to visit, members of the team start to disappear.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Dennis & Gnasher Unleashed!
channel.desc: There's a werewolf-type creature on the prowl and suspicion falls on Gnasher. Dennis has to prove his best pal's innocence as the full moon shines down on Beanotown..

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Boy Girl Dog Cat Mouse Cheese
channel.desc: After a bad haircut, Dog tries wearing a fancy tuxedo until his fur grows back. Unfortunately, his initial reaction to wearing clothes causes him and the gang to accidentally destroy the rich neighbour lady's fence. But while the others are forced to rebuild it, the neighbour lady gives tuxedo-clad Dog a pass, thinking someone of his style and class is too good for manual labor. Resentment grows as the gang breaks their backs in the hot sun while Dog lives the good life with the fancy lady. How long can this go on.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Newsround
channel.desc: Topical news magazine for children.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
channel.desc: After touching a mysterious tooth, a lemming turns into a were-lemming.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
channel.desc: Grizzy uses a hen to protect some Yummy jars from the Lemmings.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
channel.desc: A new secret formula has disastrous results.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Odd Squad
channel.desc: When Seattle Mr O accidentally turns himself into a creature, the Mobile Unit is called in to help.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: The Strange Chores
channel.desc: Law and order has a new face as the gang investigate who is responsible for a series of mysterious slimings in the neighbourhood - they are gonna crack this case wide open.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Danny and Mick
channel.desc: Salesman Mr Smallman wants to sell his new robot Bot-Bot to the leisure centre to make their lives easier. He leaves it for a day so they can trial it, but Danny breaks it within minutes. However, he has a bright idea and convinces Mick to become Bot-Bot and fool Sharon.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Bitesize Daily: 5-7 Year Olds
channel.desc: Learn about sharing by halving, sharing equally and grouping equally.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Wow That's Amazing
channel.desc: Get ready for incredible experiments and mind-bending puzzles to impress your friends. Owain and Tilly are here to explore epic science tricks to try at home and showcase new technology innovations from around the world! In this episode, we discover the bubbly science behind burping, meet the robot taking the art world by storm, find out how a playing card can defy gravity and learn how to juggle using a hairdryer.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Our School
channel.desc: It?s a new term for everyone at Our School. There is an exciting ?human sat-nav? challenge for year 7, plus a quiz on how much all the students know about their teachers.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Go Get Arty
channel.desc: The Kwapongs make a bug jungle, Chris Howarth makes sand art waves, and Rob Biddulph shows how to draw a furry monster.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: One Zoo Three
channel.desc: The One Zoo Three brothers are on a mission to compose a zoo musical using the sounds of the animals. Lar gibbons Shany and Raff swing into action and audition to be the perfect percussionists, while a health check with Bombura the loud kookaburra sees him in with a shout for lead vocals. Even playful jaguar cub Inka proves she can add a cracking big crunch to the mix! Meanwhile, Aaron reveals some facts about Darwin the hornbill?s hidden talents, Tyler takes on a breathtaking challenge with an anaconda, and the brothers recall their conservation travels to Uganda to see how rangers are helping protect the African elephant population.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: The Dengineers
channel.desc: Community on Solid Ground is a youth centre in Whalley Range. Before they took over the building the area didn't offer much for the youngsters living there and antisocial behaviour was very common. That has dropped by 73 per cent since Community on Solid Ground came along, the kids can hang out, play sports and have a place to go that means they aren't hanging around the streets. Sadly the facilities are very tired, and they don't have areas they can play their beloved sport on. The Dengineers are going to transform their outside space into a sports arena worthy of the Olympics... well, nearly.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Absolute Genius with Dick and Dom
channel.desc: Dick and Dom reveal the genius of Archimedes, the ancient Greek mathematician and expert engineer. Inspired by Archimedes, they come up with their own genius idea when they bring one his most brilliant inventions to life, with some explosive results.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Operation Ouch!
channel.desc: The doctors put the strength of human hair to the test and find out what makes different colours and types of hair.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Shark Bites
channel.desc: Steve Backshall meets a superspeedy shark. Reaching speeds of 50kph, the mako is the fastest shark in the sea. With fast-swimming prey like tuna and mackerel, mako sharks need to move quickly. But how do they reach such meteoric speeds? Steve first snorkels with these lightning-quick sharks off the coast of San Diego in California, before getting under their skin in his shark lab to reveal their hidden speed secrets.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Danny and Mick
channel.desc: Danny and Mick?s boss, Joy, has had her office redecorated and has asked the brothers to put everything back in her office. As always, Danny and Mick get distracted and don?t get the job done. Joy finds them messing about which causes Danny to accidentally spill a smoothie on her new wallpaper. Joy is unaware, so Danny and Mick need to secretly sort out the problem before she finds out! Danny and Mick don?t do anything easily and ending up in a lot of mess with a lot of wallpaper paste.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Andy and the Band
channel.desc: After Moxy?s drums go missing, Andy concludes it was their rival band, Sandy and the Same Socks! Getting paranoid, a chase ensues as Andy accuses them of stealing everything.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Bro's in Control
channel.desc: Callum is a Little Bro in control! He?s made a series of funny, gungy and gross challenges for his Big Bro Adam and best mate Joe to see who?s the best and who loses, having to take on a forfeit from the Wheel of Doom. When a slime baby shows up at their front door, Adam and Joe suddenly take on daddy duties. But how do you comfort a slime baby, teach it to speak or take it for a walk without spilling the slime? And once that?s over, Callum challenges them to become life-sized toys and hunt around their house for epic accessories. Who?ll race back to their toy box first, Adam or Joe? These daddy-os are about to find out in this head-to-head epic battle to determine who?s the CEO and who?s taking a spin on the Wheel of Doom.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Octonauts: Above & Beyond
channel.desc: A lyrebird confounds the Octonauts with its ability to mimic any sound it hears.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Big Lizard
channel.desc: A triple solar eclipse is about to happen! Cosima and Big Lizard race down the volcano and hitch a lift on a dragonfly so that they can get vital equipment to Dad in the nick of time.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Danger Mouse
channel.desc: Danger Mouse must fight his own urge to be awesome to stop the world turning into a gigantic intergalactic tourist attraction. Attempting to prove his theory that what the world always needs is a hero, Danger Mouse fights off what appears to be an alien invasion of Earth - but his inflated ego soon becomes the real intergalactic threat.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Danger Mouse
channel.desc: Animated series. When the Baron rearranges the countries of the world, Danger Mouse reluctantly joins forces with his American counterpart Jeopardy Mouse and takes New Zealand for a spin.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Dennis & Gnasher Unleashed!
channel.desc: The after-school art club is under threat of imminent demolition. In trying to save the club, the gang end up on the trail of the mysterious undercover urban artist known only as Pranksy.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Dennis & Gnasher Unleashed!
channel.desc: Convinced that Mrs Creecher is secretly a master of Blamjitsu, JJ persuades the gang to help trick her into revealing her blam credentials.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Super Happy Magic Forest
channel.desc: To avoid Herbert?s surprise visits via his tunnels in the Big Birch, the other heroes take any quest and must deal with an angry plant.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Super Happy Magic Forest
channel.desc: When tasked with the simple quest of building a flat-packed wardrobe, the heroes fail to read the instructions and are whirled into a wonky world.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: So Awkward Academy
channel.desc: Can underdog Cranmede take on the mighty reigning champions Gorsforth at the Interschool Country Dance Championships? And can Tam overcome her dance demons in time.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Game on Grandparents
channel.desc: Guided by pro-gamer Slogo, the teams serve up an epic game of Switch Sports Tennis. Who will ace it and bag a place in the finals.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Dragons: The Nine Realms
channel.desc: Tom and the Riders try to save Icaris when it is revealed to be in danger from a monstrous dragon.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Dennis & Gnasher Unleashed!
channel.desc: When poor Gnasher is laid up wearing the 'collar of shame', Dennis takes Rasher to school instead, disguised as an exchange student. Walter takes a shine to this new girl and, totally embarrassed to find that the object of his affections is Rasher the pig, plots his revenge.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Ninja Express
channel.desc: A school girl orders a wish-granting vase so she doesn't have to go to school, but the Ninjas must face a series of tests set by the vase's guardian in order to get it.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Super Happy Magic Forest
channel.desc: When the heroes quest to stop Balthazar from turning forest folk into household objects, Herbert realises that he can defeat the wizard?s spell by using the magic tricks he has practiced. Blossom is particularly intrigued by Herbert the Peculiar?s tricks, not to mention his stage name, so when Herbert himself is transformed into a table lamp, it?s Blossom the Very Impressive to the rescue.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Shaun the Sheep
channel.desc: Children's animation. It is a peaceful night at the farm, until Shaun starts to walk in his sleep and the flock cannot resist their natural instinct to follow.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
channel.desc: Grizzy snares a swordfish, but the Lemmings lure it out to sea. The cabin starts to slide.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Boy Girl Dog Cat Mouse Cheese
channel.desc: When Cheese is disappointed by the role she was cast in for her favourite soap opera, she takes matters into her own hands to get a bigger role.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
channel.desc: Heat-loving hippies move into Mr Krabs' soup vat.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Odd Squad
channel.desc: The Mobile Unit faces a series of odd challenges that only Orla knows how to stop.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Odd Squad
channel.desc: The Mobile Unit must teach the agents in the Odd Squad Arctic office how to solve a case for themselves.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Miraculous: Tales of Ladybug & Cat Noir
channel.desc: Learn how the heroes became Ladybug and Cat Noir.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Winx Club - The Magic Is Back
channel.desc: Following a scary encounter with a magic creature on her 16th birthday, Bloom discovers that she has magical powers. She is rescued by two fairies from Alfea School for Fairies and Witches.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Deadly 60
channel.desc: Steve Backshall tracks cheetahs across Zambia by motorbike, witnessing epic hunting and the challenges faced by this endangered predator.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: The Next Step
channel.desc: Michelle learns the truth about Chloe's financial situation. The dancers compete for the solo spot in the regionals routine.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Shark Bites
channel.desc: Steve Backshall meets the most sinister shark in our seas. The ragged tooth shark has a mouth that's overflowing with terrifying teeth. But why does it need such gnarly gnashers? Steve heads out on a dive after dark to see these fearsome fangs for himself, before revealing their sinister secret in his shark lab.
